Windows NT: (installable drivers for Windows XP  2003. Included with Windows Vista SP1 and newer.)
Linux: (available as a kernel module or FUSE driver)

DOS: (FAT16 from DOS 3.0  FAT16B from DOS 3.31  FAT16X from DOS 7.0)

Windows 9x: (with 3rd-party drivers like Paragon NTFS for Win98  DiskInternals NTFS Reader)
macOS: natively read only  write support with Paragon NTFS or ntfs-3g
write support since Mac OS X 10.6 and no support at all since macOS 10.15

Linux: - writing support only to unjournalled FS

- until 2.1.20
Experimental port available to 2.6.32 and later

Windows NT: with Paragon ExtFS <ref name="Paragon ExtFS for Windows"></ref> or partial with Ext2 IFS<ref name="Ext2 IFS for Windows"> (Provides kernel level read/write access to Ext2 and Ext3 volumes in Windows NT4  2000  XP and Vista.)</ref> or ext2fsd<ref name="Ext2fs Driver"></ref>
macOS: with Paragon ExtFS <ref name="Paragon ExtFS for Mac"></ref> or ext2fsx

Windows NT: with Paragon ExtFS <ref name="Paragon ExtFS for Windows"/> or partial with Ext2 IFS<ref name="Ext2 IFS for Windows"/> or ext2fsd<ref name="Ext2fs Driver"/>
macOS: with Paragon ExtFS <ref name="Paragon ExtFS for Mac"/> or partial with ext2fsx (journal not updated on writing)

Windows NT: with Paragon ExtFS <ref name="Paragon ExtFS for Windows"/> or partial with Ext2 IFS<ref name="Ext2 IFS for Windows"/> or ext2fsd<ref name="Ext2fs Driver"/>
macOS: with Paragon ExtFS <ref name="Paragon ExtFS for Mac"/>
FreeBSD: support in kernel since version 10.1 (read-only)<ref name="ext3"/><ref name="ext3_2"/>
- Read Only from 6.0 to 10.x<ref></ref> and dropped in 11.0<ref></ref><ref></ref>

macOS: with Read/Write Developer Preview<ref name="zfs on mac os x"></ref>
